sentences.en: But use the pronouns to substitute the subjects in both interrogative sentences.
sentences.cn: 但是不论简答或详答的主词都要以代名词代替疑问句的主词.

sentences.en: Donovan cocked an interrogative eye at his companion, who nodded in reply.
sentences.cn: 多诺万向他的同伴投以疑问的眼神，对方点头回应。

sentences.en: He made a further interrogative noise.
sentences.cn: 他发出了进一步疑问的声音。

sentences.en: However, in linguistics, the interrogative sentence has not been adeguately studied.
sentences.cn: 然而, 语言学界对疑问句的相关研究却显不足.

sentences.en: Make these sentences negative and interrogative.
sentences.cn: 将这些句子改成否定句和疑问句.

sentences.en: Make these sentences negative then interrogative.
sentences.cn: 把这些句子变成否定句,再变成一般疑问句.

sentences.en: Not all questions have an interrogative construction.
sentences.cn: 并不是所有的问题都是疑问句结构.

sentences.en: Please alter the declarative sentence into an interrogative one.
sentences.cn: 请将那个陈述句变为疑问句.

sentences.en: Please give these special interrogative form of a brief answer.
sentences.cn: 请给出这些特殊疑问句的简略回答形式.

sentences.en: Poor Lord Warburton stared , an interrogative point in either eye.
sentences.cn: 可怜的沃伯顿勋爵给弄得目瞪口呆,两只眼睛中都打上了问号.

sentences.en: Restricted interrogative sentences are pragmatically presented as various untrue interrogative sentences.
sentences.cn: 受限制疑问句在语用上表现为各种非真性问句.

sentences.en: The interrogative sentence has serious grammatical errors, please correct them.
sentences.cn: 这个疑问句有严重的语法错误, 请你改一改.

sentences.en: There are three forms of the sentences affirmative, interrogative, and negative.
sentences.cn: 句子有三种形式:肯定句 、 否定句和疑问句.

sentences.en: This paper was detailed to describe the distribution and function of interrogative ( words ) and phrases.
sentences.cn: 本文详细描述了该书 疑问词 语的句法分布及功能.

sentences.en: Turn these sentences into interrogative sentences and then answer them.
sentences.cn: 把下列句子改成疑问句并回答.

sentences.en: WH - movement is obligatory in English. It changes sentence from affirmative to interrogative.
sentences.cn: 英语中WH移位对肯定句变疑问句是属于强制性的.

words.tran_cn: 讯问；审问；[语] 疑问句

trans.tran_en: an interrogative sentence, pronoun etc asks a question or has the form of a question. For example, ‘who’ and ‘what’ are interrogative pronouns.
